section.title: DefaultColors
section.para: DefaultColors sets the default foreground and background colors used in miscellaneous windows created by fvwm, for example in the geometry feedback windows during a move or resize operation. If you do not want to change one color or the other, use - as its color name. To revert to the built-in default colors omit both color names. Note that the default colors are not used in menus, window titles or icon titles.
